publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1301 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Rates Relief for Small Businessesâ€”That the Parliament resolves that a permanent small business rates relief scheme, which is more generous than the present 1p poundage reduction, should be introduced with effect from 1 April 2001. Supported by: Andrew Wilson*, Shona Robison*, Michael Russell*, Christine Grahame*, Linda Fabiani*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-1301 Rates Relief for Small Businesses (lodged on 31 October 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Fiona McLeod*
